questionTitle: ___ she agreed, you would have done it.
If you ___ to be chosen for the job, you'll have to be experienced in the field.
If the doctor had arrived sooner, the boy ___ saved.
If there ___ enough water, the rice fields could have been more productive.
The patient could not recover unless he ___ an operation. [undergo: pass through]
If she ___ him, she would be very happy.
If he ___ a thorough knowledge of English, he could have applied for this post.
If I had enough money, I ___ abroad to improve my English.
If it ___ convenient, let's go out for a drink tonight.
If you ___ time, please write to me.
